ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Where to go from here?
ygData.msgSnippet: The Gulf of Gunthak is a good area to start hunting in with a group, especially with all the undead on the beach area.  Other than that some people head to
ygData.messageBody:
The Gulf of Gunthak is a good area to start hunting in with a group,
especially with all the undead on the beach area. Other than that some
people head to Lake of Ill Omen to hunt sarnaks and goblins. See if either
of those areas are good for you.
----- Original Message -----
From: <fluterby42@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, February 06, 2004 3:42 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Where to go from here?


> So I've actually been reading this forum for quite a while, but
> never had reason to post. I got started playin EQ a few months ago,
> on a friend's account, and got my bard to lvl 34 before he pretty
> much wouldn't let me play anymore.
>
> Now I've got my own account, and my main is a lvl 31 cleric. Getting
> there was pretty easy, I just did everything I'd already done
> before. One of my RL friends helps me whenever he's on, but we can't
> always be on at the same time, and he's usually busy off on some
> raid with his guild. Plus I'm getting tired of bugging him all the
> time.
>
> So where do I go from here? Where are the best places for xp? Are
> there any quests or anything that I should be doing, and what? I
> would very much appreciate any suggestions.
>
> Laielenie
> lvl 31 cleric
> Fennin Ro server
>
>
>
